summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Kenny Street to Thistle Street, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the westerly side thereof, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4585, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
